items.title: Installation
items.content: Zen AI is supposed to be with you on all of youre devices, therefore we have build apps for many devices and Operating Systems.

items.title: Installation Steps
items.content:
1. Go to https://joan-code6.github.io/zen_ai/ and click on download
2. Now select youre operating system and click on download
3. After downloading the app follow the instructions given by the Programm

items.title: Signup
items.content:
Create your Zen AI account to start experiencing smarter, more efficient AI responses.

### Account Creation

- Visit the signup page
- Enter your email address
- Set a secure password
- Verify your email

**Note:** Use a strong password with at least 8 characters including numbers and symbols.

items.title: Login
items.content:
Access your Zen AI account by logging in with your credentials.

### Login Process

1. Open the Zen AI application
2. Click on the login button
3. Enter your email and password
4. Click 'Sign In'

Your session will be securely maintained across devices.

items.title: First chat
items.content:
Start your first conversation with Zen AI. The system will intelligently manage context based on your trigger words and notes.

### Example Conversation

```text
User: Tell me a recipe for chocolate cake
Zen AI: Based on your food preferences and dietary restrictions...
```

> **Tip:** The AI automatically includes relevant notes based on trigger words in your message.

items.title: Uploading documents
items.content:
Upload documents to create notes automatically. Zen AI will extract relevant information and create trigger words for efficient context management.

### Supported Formats

- PDF documents
- Word documents (.docx)
- Text files (.txt)
- Images with text (OCR)

![Document Upload Interface](/images/upload-interface.png)

The system will analyze your documents and suggest relevant trigger words for optimal context matching.
